--
name: Pull Request Schema
about: A blueprint for creating consistent Pull Requests on the yumble repo.
title: "[FEAT] Added"
labels: ''
assignees: ''

---

Should have a title beginning with any of:
* WIKI
* BUG
* FEAT  
* TEST 
* REQUEST

Adds/Deletes/Modifies/Fixes ...

(optional) Added ... dependency

Closes # .
